sentences.finnish: Minun kotini on rivitalo Tampereella, kaksi kerrosta ja se on neliö.
sentences.english: My home is a row house in Tampere, two floors and it is square.

sentences.finnish: Kodissa on keittiö, olohuone, makuuhuone ja kaksi lastenhuonetta.
sentences.english: The home has a kitchen, living room, bedroom and two children's rooms.
There is no elevator in the home.

sentences.finnish: Olohuoneessa on televisio tv-tasolla, sohva, kirjakaappi ja nojatuoli.
sentences.english: The living room has a television on a TV stand, a sofa, a bookcase and an armchair.

sentences.finnish: Siellä on ruokapöytä, astianpesukone, jääkaappi, hella ja uuni.
sentences.english: There is a dining table, dishwasher, refrigerator, stove, and oven.

sentences.finnish: Siellä on myös kahvinkeitin ja vedenkeitin.
sentences.english: There is also a coffee maker and a kettle.
The bedroom and children's rooms are upstairs.
The bedroom has a bed and a wardrobe.
There is also a lamp on the nightstand.

sentences.finnish: Kylpyhuone on yläkerrassa myös ja pesukone on kylpyhuoneessa.
sentences.english: The bathroom is also upstairs and the washing machine is in the bathroom.

sentences.finnish: Siellä on myös peili, pesuallas ja suihku.
sentences.english: There is also a mirror, sink and shower.

sentences.finnish: Lastenhuone on melko pieni mutta siellä on lasten sänky, kirjahylly ja työpöytä koska lapset menevät kouluun.
sentences.english: The children's room is quite small but there is a children's bed, bookshelf and desk because the children go to school.
There is a rug on the floor.
